short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly detect fonts on Chrome. Lightning-fast extension provides font info while browsing. Simplify your design process!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly detect fonts in Chrome with this lightning-fast extension, empowering designers with comprehensive font insights during browsing. Simplify your design process by gaining immediate access to font information right from your browser window.

Key Features:

- Font Inspection: Seamlessly analyze fonts for size, line height, weight, letter spacing, and color (RGB and hex) without interrupting your workflow.
- Copy Style: Accelerate your design workflow by swiftly copying element styles with a single click and generating CSS selectors effortlessly.
- Font Details: Dive deeper into font details and conveniently download font files for seamless integration into your projects.
- Fast Usage Button: Enhance user experience by providing a fast access button that hides the extension window when not in use, optimizing screen real estate.

Unlock a world of font possibilities and streamline your design process with this essential Chrome extension. Experience smoother workflows, faster decision-making, and unparalleled convenience.

For feedback, support, and inquiries, contact us at stakhov.artur@gmail.com. Download now to revolutionize your design journey!
